rules_text:
Each player who doesn't control a planeswalker can't cast more than one spell each turn.
Ayeshicycling {3} [i]({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Ayeshi card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Immortality first begins as exploring the vast desert that is the multiverse, but as the millennia pass, you soon devote yourself to counting grains of sand.”[/i]
